meanings.definition: A type of decorative braid or cord used in military uniforms.
meanings.sent1: The soldier proudly displayed his uniform with shiny doolies.
meanings.sent2: The general inspected the doolies on the new recruits' uniforms.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cadet tied the doolies together to prank his friend.
meanings.sent4: The doolies on the uniform were like golden threads of honor.
meanings.sent5: The intricate doolies added elegance to the military attire.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a raised pattern.
meanings.sent1: The couch was covered in soft doolies that felt cozy.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate design of the doolies on the curtains.
meanings.sent3: The doolies on the pillow looked like tiny mountains.
meanings.sent4: The doolies on the fabric created a textured feel.
meanings.sent5: The doolies on the blanket added a touch of luxury.

meanings.definition: A slang term for money or cash.
meanings.sent1: He made sure to always carry enough doolies for emergencies.
meanings.sent2: She saved up her doolies to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent3: The kids were excited to earn some extra doolies for treats.
meanings.sent4: His wallet was filled with hard-earned doolies.
meanings.sent5: The doolies jingled in his pocket as he walked.
